attributes.review: first of all, as soon as i downloaded the app all my info was sold to the black market! i was very upset but i got my information back fortunately. but when i OPENED THE APP, let me tell you. i saw a nude photo of our president himself! he's not big at all but i am traumatized! and when i went to put in my information, the app sent a hit man to kill my great grandfather! he was 101 years old. and the hit man slammed my great grandfather on the ground and screamed "trump 2020!!" before spitting on my nieces ankles! please fix this or i will not be putting in my social security number for this app!!! 😠🤚🏻.
attributes.title: VERY BAD NO GOOD

attributes.review: 4 years have taught us that Trump just isn’t fit to be president. He’s put people against each other, and has done little to serve the ENTIRE nation and it’s citizens. Hispanic children and families are in detention facilities, many experience sexual assault and human trafficking! Sources say it’s even comparable to concentration camps! POC are still treated low and attacked; I mean, has Trump done anything beneficial towards the modern lynching? The brutality of police? I can go on, but to cut to the chase, this app advocates for someone who has proven himself biased to a certain demographic and overall unfit to serve our nation.
attributes.title: More is at stake here!

attributes.review: i downloaded this app to be more informed about the pop culture everyone talks about. instead of learning something, i had to wait so long for it to download(i think it’s taking all the data on my phone) then when it finally was ready i was astonished by the many cheetos on my page! everywhere i looked cheeto! cheeto with bad tan! cheeto with combover! it was like i entered into a reddit thread with people who all had weird cheeto fetishes. would not recommend for anyone unless they have a cheeto fetish. if said prospective customer has said fetish then 100% recommend!
attributes.title: DO NOT GET UNLESS YOU HAVE CHEETO FETISH

attributes.review: I downloaded this app and let me just say, that was the worst decision I’ve ever made in my life. As I opened the app I saw a ginormous Cheeto. I was so frightened that ALL of my hair fell off 👩🏼‍🦲 Because of my baldness I fell into a deep depression 😭and I stopped feeding my cat so it ran away. Then I come to find out that my cat 🐱 was almost run over by this minivan, but lucky the minivan didn’t run my cat over but it did crash into a fire hydrant and now my whole city is flooded 🌊 . I’m now living with a family of fish 🐠 who have gracefully taken me in. So DONT DOWNLOAD THIS APP !!
attributes.title: Do download unless you want your hair to fall off

attributes.review:
i opened the app to see the Cheeto man praising to Hitler👎🏼 my poor dog jumped out the window due to that horrid picture, I will be sending a bill for all of her injuries. After that my phone started glitching really bad and turned off, when I turned it back on I had a live wallpaper of the Cheeto man getting a spray tan with his little wewe sticking out. honestly how did he even make kids?That thing is the size of a five-year-olds pinky toe. 
In conclusion THIS APP IS HORRIBLE IT SHOULD BE DELETED OFF EARTH ALONG WITH THE CHEETO HIMSELF  ps. should probably go get that checked out that’s a serious problem🤩😋😙🥰👋🏽
attributes.title: I WILL BE SENDING A BILL😾😡 ( save barron)

attributes.review: I gave it one star because he is a A racist President and nobody like him and he is a Orange duck and he doesn’t love his wife also a president should not be a dick . also should not tell people to kill people and he say make America great he mean make America White again. Also he is a  rapist and we should not have a rapist president also he act like is amazing but in Real life he is a dick and all countries matter and everything you try todo doesn’t work because you ruin everything in life we were fine with out you 🤬🤬😤😤 and this how you look like 🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊🍊.
attributes.title: Take this app down

attributes.review: I have no clue how this works and I hope this is anonymous but I am so ducking heartbroken and idk if I can ever recover from this. She was my everything. The only person I care about and now she’s gone and we are supposedly still friends but it just doesn’t feel the same. They say you never stop loving someone. You just love the next person you meet more but I can’t love anyone more than her. She’s the only person that makes me happy. There isn't one thing I don't value about her. I just thought she was my soul mate.
attributes.title: Ik nobody will read this so it doesn’t matter

attributes.review: I downloaded the app just to understand and weigh my options on presidency. So I made an account with my email, name, phone number ect... AS SOON AS I CLICKED SUBMIT I got a flood of text messages. I pushed stop then a few days later telemarketers were calling me saying they got my number from an app. This was the only recent app I’ve given my phone number to. Then, my email got hacked, I had to change my phone number, AND My credit card info in my email was hacked. WORST AND MOST NON SECURE APP ON THIS STORE. It’s terrible. Do NOT DOWNLOAD unless you want all your information stolen
attributes.title: So much for privacy

attributes.review: I’m stupefied by the horrendous and awful, cruel and nasty content of this app. I’m absolutely traumatized by this. I opened the app and was immediately bombarded with tiny orange dick pics!!! It was an entire slide of just shrimp dick pictures of the nasty pig faced runt himself!! There were also pictures of some sort of fugly orange monster with rotten teeth, a bald head and no eyes, and therefore no soul. I’m just assuming it was the president with no makeup or wig on. !!!DO NOT GET THIS APP!!! I have to go to therapy 25 times a day and I can’t look at anything orange without having flashbacks and trauma. This is awful, don’t ever get this app.
attributes.title: I have ptsd now.
